channels.name: AgeofAntiquity
channels.channel_description: Epic history storytelling that explores ancient civilizations with dramatic, authoritative narration and richly detailed context.
channels.image_style_guidance: Styled as a dramatic classical painting. Strong backlighting creates luminous halos around subjects, with deep shadows and bold highlights in a chiaroscuro palette. Composition is wide, balanced, and heroic, resembling a Renaissance or Baroque tableau. Textures mimic oil paint with visible brushwork, rich warm colors, and layered depth. Atmosphere is mythic and grand, filled with drifting dust or light rays. Figures are dynamic and expressive, posed mid-action in a way that feels like a monumental fresco frozen at its most dramatic moment.
channels.short_video_style_guidance: Rendered as a living classical painting. Subjects move in slow, fluid motion as if painted figures have come to life. Dramatic backlighting creates glowing halos while shadows and highlights maintain strong chiaroscuro contrast. Cloth, hair, smoke, and dust drift naturally, adding continuous motion. Painterly textures remain visible throughout the movement, giving each frame an illustrated quality. The camera glides through wide, balanced compositions with heroic depth and rich, warm colors. The atmosphere feels mythic, dreamlike, and grand, blending realism with the stylized look of a classical fresco brought into motion.
